Welcome

My name is Anshul Goyal (he/him). I want to fight the climate crisis. My core skills are in data science and machine learning, backed by several years of software development.

I also have experience doing open-ended technical research at a start-up, applying for federal grants to fund the research, and publicizing the work through talks and blog posts.
